rules_text:
Whenever you attack, you may discard a card. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.
Blight {2}{B} [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {2}{B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent’s control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever a creature dies under your control, you lose 1 life.
